ftbquests.chapter.basic.title: Basic[--基础--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.subtitle: From chests to vaults[--从箱子到保险柜--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests0.subtitle: Bigger on the inside[--小身体大容量--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests0.descript: &eIron Chests&r adds several tiers of &bChests&r, each holding more than the last.[--&e更多箱子&r添加了几个等级的&b箱子&r,每个等级都会多一些容量.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests1.title: Functional Drawers[--功能抽屉--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests1.subtitle: For the Fat Stacks[--巨额堆叠--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests1.descript: &eFunctional Drawers&r adds a variety of &bDrawers&r, which hold a large amount of a single item per slot.[--&e功能性存储&r添加了各种&b抽屉&r,每个槽位都可容纳大量单种物品.--]
Unupgraded, a Drawer holds 32 stacks split equally between its slots.[--未升级的抽屉在槽位之间平均分配32组物品。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests2.subtitle: The Big Splash[--大喷射--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests2.descript: &bFluid Drawers&r store a fluid in each slot.[--&b流体抽屉&r在每一个槽位中储存流体.--]
They can be upgraded in the same way Drawers can.[--它们与抽屉一样可以升级.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests3.subtitle: &lDrawer&r[--&l抽屉&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests3.descript: &bCompacting Drawers&r allow you to input and output the &6Nugget, Ingot, and Block forms&r of whatever's inside.[--&b压缩抽屉&r可以让你输入或输出内容物对应的&6粒、锭或块&r--]
Beware: this plays oddly with the &6Storage Bus&r, &6External Storage&r, and the like.[--注意:这和&6存储总线&r、&6外部存储总线&r等等放在一起表现的有点奇怪。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests4.subtitle: Mass storage[--量子存储--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests4.descript: The &bStorage Controller&r's inventory is composed of &6all the inventories of linked Drawers&r. This makes it ideal for automation etc.[--&b存储控制器&r连接着&6所有连接的抽屉&r的存储.对于自动化来说非常友好.--]

Use a &bLinking Tool&r on the Storage Controller to set it, then click it on other Drawers in an &68 block radius&r to connect them. They do not have to be touching.[--在存储控制器上使用&b连接工具&r设置它,然后单击&68格半径限制&r内的其他抽屉连接它们.之间不需要相邻.--]
&6Controller Extensions&r can be used to connect to Drawers further away. The Controller Extension is linked to both the Controller and the distant Drawers.[--&6控制拓展器&r可以连接更远的抽屉.作为控制器和远处的抽屉之间的连接.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests5.subtitle: Number go up[--容量上升--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests5.descript: &bStorage Upgrades&r can be installed onto Drawers to &6increase their capacity&r.[--&b存储升级&r可以安装在抽屉上,&6增加其容量&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests6.descript: These &bFunctional Upgrades&r change how the Drawer works in some way, other than the amount it can store.[--这些&b功能升级&r会改变抽屉的行为,不会改变储存数量.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests7.descript: These &bConversion Upgrades&r can be used to &6upgrade a Chest's tier&r.[--&b转换升级&r可用于&6提升箱子等级&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests7.tasks0.t: Iron Chest Conversion Upgrades[--铁箱子转换升级--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests8.subtitle: Too much of a good thing[--好东西多到装不下--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests8.descript: &bTrash Cans&r delete anything that enters them.[--所有输入&b垃圾桶&r的东西都会被删除.--]
